title: SoftBank’s 40% Slide From Peak Shows Worry Over Giant OpenAI Bet

title: McKinsey Cuts About 200 Tech Jobs, Shifts More Roles to AI
description: McKinsey & Co. cut about 200 global tech jobs in the past week as the consulting firm joins rivals in using artificial intelligence to automate some positions.
content:

title: Jean Baudrillard: The Prophet of AI and Hyperreality
description: Jean Baudrillard, a visionary philosopher, foresaw the rise of artificial intelligence and its impact on humanity. His predictions about digital culture painted AI as a mental prosthesis, potentially jeopardizing our freedom. Baudrillard's thoughts continue to resonate in today's hyperreal world, characterized by AI's pervasive presence.
content: Jean Baudrillard, the visionary philosopher who predicted the rise of artificial intelligence, remains a significant figure in understanding digital culture. His insights into AI's potential impact on humanity were remarkably prescient, painting a pi... [739 chars]

title: Clair Obscur leads the AP's list of 2025's top video games
description: It's been a difficult year for the people who create video games, with layoffs persisting while the tech industry tries to force us to use artificial intelligence for everything. But great games emerged nonetheless — and I can't imagine AI ever being able to deliver the kind of thrilling, rewarding adventures we've seen in 2025.
